name: Defense of Evergreen
description: The colony's overall defensive readiness and ability to withstand hostile attacks. Progress represents improved fortifications, better coordination, and enhanced security measures.

name: Colony Morale
description: The general mood and confidence of Evergreen's civilian population. High morale improves cooperation and reduces panic during crisis situations.

name: Infrastructure Repairs
description: Critical repairs to colony systems including communications, power, and transportation. Completion of repairs improves overall colony functionality.

name: Intelligence Network
description: The colony's ability to gather information about hostile forces and predict their movements. Better intelligence leads to more effective defensive strategies.

name: Supply Lines
description: Maintenance of crucial supply routes and resource distribution. Secure supply lines ensure continued operations and civilian welfare.
